a.title: MHS Band and Choir Awards Concert

div.div: MHS Band and Choir Awards Concert

div.p:
The district is located in Manteno, IL on Interstate 57, approximately 50 miles south of Chicago. The district is made up of 3 schools, educating over 2100 students in pre-school through grade 12.
Our Mission
The mission of Manteno CUSD No. 5 is to continually strive to be an organization that is highly regarded for its academic excellence, the opportunities it provides for students and the positive contributions that it makes to our community.
Our Vision
The vision of Manteno CUSD No. 5 is to prepare all students for life-long success by providing a rigorous and engaging educational experience in a safe, supportive and nurturing environment.
Click Here for our Free Mobile App!
